[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”title” title_text_align=”center” subhead_text_align=”center” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_layout=”light” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”10px||10px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”28px” title_font_size_phone=”22px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.11″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

International Conference on Data Mining (ICDM) 2021 will be coming to you via a brand new virtual platform.

The conference will use a cutting edge system that makes it possible to deliver the elements that you would normally expect from a conference – only this time, it’s all online. You will be able to take part in live panel discussions, set up one-on-one meetings with other attendees and watch keynotes from internationally renowned presenters. We invite you to watch the short video below for your first look at the Virtual Conference Platform.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_video_slider _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video_slider_item src=”https://vimeo.com/477889230″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” show_image_overlay=”off”][/et_pb_video_slider_item][/et_pb_video_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Timeline

Your live agenda of sessions and activities in one easy to use screen.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Meeting Hub

A great place to meet, trade contact details and exchange ideas one-on-one with other attendees.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Live Support

Chat or share your screen with one of our Support team to get technical assistance during ICDM 2021.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Engage

Participate in sessions via Q&A with the presenter, take notes and discuss presentations with other attendees via the Discussion Forum.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Virtual Sessions

Attend a range of sessions including keynote and invited addresses, panel discussions and ePoster presentations.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Virtual Exhibition

Explore the virtual exhibition area, browsing virtual booths and meeting our exhibitors.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
